com.amplifyframework.logging

Interface Logger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BroadcastLogger

    public interface Logger
    A component which can emit logs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void debug(java.lang.String message)
      Logs a message at the LogLevel.DEBUG level.
      void error(java.lang.String message)
      Logs a message at the LogLevel.ERROR level.
      void error(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable error)
      Logs a message and thrown error at LogLevel.ERROR level.
      java.lang.String getNamespace()
      Gets the namespace of the logger.
      LogLevel getThresholdLevel()
      Gets the minimum log-level, below which no logs are emitted.
      void info(java.lang.String message)
      Logs a message at LogLevel.INFO level.
      void verbose(java.lang.String message)
      Logs a message at the LogLevel.VERBOSE level.
      void warn(java.lang.String message)
      Log a message at the LogLevel.WARN level.
      void warn(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable issue)
      Log a message and a throwable issue at the LogLevel.WARN level.

    • Method Detail

      • getThresholdLevel

        LogLevel getThresholdLevel()
        Gets the minimum log-level, below which no logs are emitted. This value is assigned when obtaining and instance of the logger.
        Returns:
        The minimum permissible LogLevel for which logs will be emitted

      • getNamespace

        java.lang.String getNamespace()
        Gets the namespace of the logger.
        Returns:
        namespace for logger

      • error

        void error(java.lang.String message)
        Logs a message at the LogLevel.ERROR level.
        Parameters:
        message - An error message

      • error

        void error(java.lang.String message,
           java.lang.Throwable error)
        Logs a message and thrown error at LogLevel.ERROR level.
        Parameters:
        message - An error message
        error - A thrown error

      • warn

        void warn(java.lang.String message)
        Log a message at the LogLevel.WARN level.
        Parameters:
        message - A warning message

      • warn

        void warn(java.lang.String message,
          java.lang.Throwable issue)
        Log a message and a throwable issue at the LogLevel.WARN level.
        Parameters:
        message - A warning message
        issue - An issue that caused this warning
